Name: nasal cavity cancer
Definition: A respiratory system cancer that is located_in the nasal cavity.
Synonym: malignant tumor of the nasal cavity

Name: Binder syndrome
Definition: An otitis interna which involves inflammation of the labyrinths.

Name: rhinitis
Definition: A upper respiratory infectious disease which involves irritation and inflammation of the mucous membrane of the nose due to viruses

Name: nasal cavity neoplasm
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves zoonotic infection caused by Moniezia expansa

Name: choanal atresia
Definition: A bronchial disease that is a chronic inflammatory condition of one or more bronchi or bronchioles marked by dilatation and loss of elasticity of the walls resulting from damage to the airway wall leading to the formation of small sacs on the bronchial wall and impairment of cilia mobility in the lung. Inflammation of the bronchial wall increases mucus secretion which serves as a breeding ground for bacteria. Bronchiectasis is caused by repeated respiratory infections
